title: Mario Golf Super Rush Preview Kinda Funny First Impressions
description:
Tim and Blessing got to see about an hour of Mario Golf Super Rush!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] what's up and welcome back to another kind of funny first impressions as always i'm tim gettys joined by the new face of video games blessing at aoya junior what's up tim i'm loving the colors you got going on right now you got the shirt you got the matching vibes love it then you kind of funny pride shirt yeah there's like a whole collection that we have that you can get over on kindafunny.com store so good welcome to pre-three is what we've been calling it uh the pre-e3 stuff going on this is some of the preview events unfortunately since everything's digital we haven't really been able to do much hands-on stuff that we normally do at e3 but got a couple hands-off impressions coming up for you this is the first of probably many and today we are talking about mario golf super rush on the nintendo switch both blessing and i got to see about an hour of it right like it was a pretty fair fair chunk of gameplay there bopping around a whole bunch of the different uh gameplay modes

on the nintendo switch both blessing and i got to see about an hour of it right like it was a pretty fair fair chunk of gameplay there bopping around a whole bunch of the different uh gameplay modes and stuff uh and again we didn't get to play it but we did get to see a lot of it we got to ask some questions uh to the developers blessing what do you think so far yeah it looks really cool it looks really awesome you know this feels like it's going to be what mario mario tennis aces was for mario tennis i think this is pretty much going to be that for mario golf uh the one differentiator i'd say is that i think the adventure mode is going to be a bit more uh well received and gonna feel a bit more uh contentful than the mario tennis aces one because mario tennis aces i felt left a lot of us wanting you know out of that single player mode and i don't necessarily know if if um the adventure mode out of mario golf is going to be the greatest things in sliced bread but i think it will leave
